ber PHL

summary: Cigts  Bronds - Forefen. Canadian ~ "Gen.," "We J. kravekoph" June 19, 2968. Cy Kern, Jr., Coordinator ofNev Producto Division = Resosreh and Develophant. "I would like to send ve sono’ Kanon cige-retles snde by Kothuana in Canada. We vould lke to have tive cartons," he said.
